description: PageClass for Test Case TC-FT-010: Define a rule with empty conditions, trigger rule, and validate execution.
imports: from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC

define_rule_empty_conditions.description: Defines a rule with after_deposit trigger, fixed amount action, and empty conditions.

trigger_rule.description: Triggers the rule with deposit input and validates execution.

documentation.executive_summary: This PageClass automates defining a rule with empty conditions and triggering it as described in TC-FT-010.
documentation.implementation_guide: 1. Instantiate RuleManagementPage_TC_FT_010 with Selenium WebDriver. 2. Call define_rule_empty_conditions() with test data. 3. Call trigger_rule() and validate transfer execution.
documentation.quality_assurance_report: All fields validated. Explicit waits used. Edge cases handled: empty conditions, deposit input validation.
documentation.troubleshooting_guide: Check element IDs. Validate deposit input format. Ensure rule is saved before triggering.
